Room.Name: On the trail to moria
Room.Description: The massive Western Arch of Midgaard towers before you, a monument to mortal ingenuity and testament to the wealth of glorious Midgaard. Reaching well over forty feet towards the skies, the arch supports massive blocks of granite that reach even higher. Beyond the equally massive wooden gates to the east, stretches a broad thoroughfare that runs through the heart of Midgaard The clamor of restless activity emanates from the east, rolling out across the worn cobblestone roads of the city. To the west, a dirt path leads out into the downs beyond.

Exit.Description: The cobblestone path continues, sparsely lined with trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cobblestones beneath you are well-worn, but not cracked or uneven.
The western gate of Midgaard towers over you.
A barrivaded guard tower looms to the north.

Room.Name: On the Edge of the Downs
Room.Description: The sparse row of trees which surrounded Midgaard comes to an end here. To the west, rolling green hills of grass continue on till the edge of sight. Back down the road to the east you notice the massive walls of Midgaard looming over the treetops. Scrubby foliage lies to either side of the path here, but ends abruptly at the edge of the downs. The cobblestone path which leads from Midgaard spreads out to the west, and then dissipates into a grassy path.

Exit.Description: The scrubby foliage surrounding the walls of the Midgaard continues in this direction.
The scrubby foliage surrounding the walls of the Midgaard continues in this direction.
A dirt path begins in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cobblestones beneath you are well-worn, but not cracked or uneven.

Room.Name: Upon the Grassy Hills of the Downs
Room.Description: The emerald expanse of grassy, rolling hills surround you. The long green grass waves and dances, moved by the invisible wind. Wisps of fog lie in the low spots, writhing and flowing with the slightest change in the breeze. The twin peaks of Mount Cim rise up in the north, and a vast forest can be seen off to the southwest.

Exit.Description: A cobblestone road can be seen in this direction.
A dirt path can be seen up ahead.

ExtraDescription.Description: A thick blanket of lush green grass covers the ground.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.

Room.Name: Upon the Grassy Hills of the Downs
Room.Description: The emerald expanse of grassy, rolling hills surround you. The long green grass waves and dances, moved by the invisible wind. Wisps of fog lie in the low spots, writhing and flowing with the slightest change in the breeze. The twin peaks of Mount Cim rise up in the north, and a vast forest can be seen off to the southwest.

Exit.Description: A cobblestone street begins up ahead.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.
A dirt path can be seen up ahead.

ExtraDescription.Description: A thick blanket of lush green grass covers the ground.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.

Room.Name: A Dirt Path through the Downs
Room.Description: An expanse of grassy, rolling hills completely surrounds this small dirt path. Wisps of fog hide in the low spots between the hills, writhing and flowing to the change in breeze. The soft emerald peaks of the downs continue endlessly to the edge of the horizon. The long grass waves and dances, revealing the invisible wind. The dusty path you stand on snakes through the downs like a vein, leading far off into the distance.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
Lush green hills rise up in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks makes up the ground beneath you.
Lush green hills rise up in this direction.

The ground seems disapear a little ways in this direction.

Room.Name: Nearing a Stone Bridge
Room.Description: The lush, green hills plunge steeply down to the rushing waters of the Sywilm. The grass covered ground rises up once more on the other side of the river after plummeting at least one hundred feet down to the frothing waters. A massive bridge of stone traverses the river allowing passage across the gap. The rolling hills of the downs continue off to the east, and you notice a dense forest looming on the other side of the river.

Exit.Description: The dirt path continues in this direction.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.
A massive stone bridge crosses the ravine up ahead.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks make up the ground beneath you.
Green rolling fields continue in this direction.

Room.Name: Upon the Grassy Hills of the Downs
Room.Description: The emerald expanse of grassy, rolling hills surround you. The long green grass waves and dances, moved by the invisible wind. Wisps of fog lie in the low spots, writhing and flowing with the slightest change in the breeze. The twin peaks of Mount Cim rise up in the north, and a vast forest can be seen off to the southwest.

Exit.Description: A dirt path can be seen up ahead.
Green rolling hills continue in this direction.
Green rolling hills continue in this direction.

Room.Description: The emerald expanse of grassy, rolling hills surround you. The long green grass waves and dances, moved by the invisible wind. Exit.Description: Green rolling hills continue in this direction.
Green rolling hills continue in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A thick blanket of lush green grass covers the ground.
Green rolling hills continue in this direction.
Green rolling hills continue in this direction.

Room.Name: A Stone Bridge Crossing
Room.Description: This bridge is composed of thousands of fieldstones fastened together by a dark grey mortar. A breathtaking view of the great Sywilm can be seen from either side of the bridge. To the north the great peaks of Mount Cim pierce the sky. Off to the south the river snakes its way down into the lowland marshes. Trails begin on either side of the bridge where it meets the edges of the ravine.

Exit.Description: A stone railing runs along the edge of the bridge, providing a small ammount of safety.
The path leads off into the downs.
A stone railing runs along the edge of the bridge, providing a small ammount of safety.
The path leads out into the dense woods.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bridge beneath you is composed of an uncalculable ammount of fieldstones.

Room.Name: Nearing a Stone Bridge
Room.Description: The lush, green hills plunge steeply down to the rushing waters of the Sywilm. The grass covered ground rises up once more on the other side of the river after plummeting at least one hundred feet down to the frothing waters. A massive bridge of stone traverses the river allowing passage across the gap. The dense forest continues to the west, and you can see the rolling hills of the downs beginning on the other side of the river.

Exit.Description: A massive stone bridge crosses the ravine up ahead.
The dirt path leads up to the edge of the woodlands.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks make up the ground beneath you.
The bordering woods end at the steep decent down to the river.
The bordering woods end at the steep decent down to the river.

Room.Name: On the Edge of the Woodlands
Room.Description: Tall oaks and maple stand as silent sentinels watching over the growth of the underwood. The perpetual rustle of leaves and the smells of damp soil waft through the air. Massive brown trunks knotted and weathered stand side by side off to the west. The green grass begins to taper as the tree tops steal the light. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim loom far to the north. A large stone bridge leading up to the edge of the downs can be seen to the east.

Exit.Description: A small path leads off in this direction.
A small path leads off in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks make up the ground beneath you.
A thick line of trees continues to border the grass in this direction.
The majestic peaks of Mount Cim loom in the distance.

Room.Name: A Stoney Clearing Within the Woodlands
Room.Description: The trees part overhead giving way to the open air above. Huge smooth stones are strewn randomly throughout the clearing. A mass of green leafy vines creep along the ground, wrapping themselves about the bases of the stones as if to hold them in place. All around the clearing tall trees stand, solemnly keeping watch over the stoney clearing. The smell of standing water wafts in from the south, in the direction of the lowlands.

Exit.Description: A small path leads off in this direction.
The stoney clearing continues in this direction.
The stoney clearing continues in this direction.
The stoney clearing continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Green leafy vines creep among the large stones beneath you.

Room.Name: A Stoney Clearing Within the Woodlands

Room.Name: A Muddy Path Through the Waterlogged Timber
Room.Description: Thick, black muck covers the watery ground. Tall grey trees rise high above you, firmly planted within the mire. Small tufts of grass sit loosly on the edge of the muddy path. Waterlogged timber lies half sunken in the muck, slowly being decomposed by moss and small delicate plants. Small holes have been made in the sides' of trees as a home for the many birds throughout the woodlands. Off to the north a small clearing can be seen, and to the south the ground becomes even soggier.

Exit.Description: The muddy path continues in this direction.
The muddy path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Thick, black mud makes up this soggy path.
The waterlogged timber continues in this direction.
The waterlogged timber continues in this direction.

Waterlogged timber lies half sunken in the muck, slowly being decomposed by moss and small delicate plants. Small holes have been made in the sides' of trees as a home for the many birds throughout the woodlands. Off to the north a small clearing can be seen, and to the south a putrid waterway can be seen.

Exit.Description: The muddy path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Thick, black mud makes up this soggy path.
The waterlogged timber continues in this direction.
The waterlogged timber continues in this direction.

Room.Name: A Mossy Trail Through the Thick Underwood
Room.Description: A host of green-gray moss grows upon the trunks and bases of the trees. Tall oak and maple rise high above you forming a sort of primal cathedral. The perpetual rustle of leaves, and the smells of damp soil waft through the air. The massive brown trunks, knotted and weathered stand thick, leading down to the deep burrowing roots. The path itself is composed of an inch of fallen leaves, and large masses of moss lining the edges. Occasionally small shafts of sunlight fight their way through the thick canopy overhead, to dance across the forest floor.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A inch of fallen leaves blankets the forest floor.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.

Room.Name: On the Fringe of a Shadowy Grove
Room.Description: The wood seems to have grown a bit darker here. A thin mist which seems to come from the north, creeps along the forest floor. A host of green-gray moss grows upon the trunks and bases of the trees. Tall oak and maple rise high above you forming a sort of primal cathedral. The perpetual rustle of leaves, and the smells of damp soil waft through the air. The massive brown trunks, knotted and weathered stand thick, leading down to the deep burrowing roots. The ground beneath you is composed of an inch of fallen leaves. To the north a strange shadowy grove opens up.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A inch of fallen leaves blankets the forest floor.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.

Room.Name: On the Edge of the Woodlands
Room.Description: Tall oaks and maple stand as silent sentinels watching over the growth of the underwood. The perpetual rustle of leaves and the smells of damp soil waft through the air. Massive brown trunks knotted and weathered stand side by side off to the west. The green grass begins to taper as the tree tops steal the light. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim loom far to the north. A deep gusty vale can be seen off to the west.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of small rocks and brown dirt cover the ground beneath you.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.
The forest grows thicker in this direction.

Room.Name: A Grassy Path Through a Deep Vale
Room.Description: This small path of trampled grass winds on through the gusty vale. Lush green grass tumbles down the slopes of the vale edge. Weeping willows hang their heads and sway gently in the breeze. Tiny natural springs bubble up from the ground, babbling softly as they run down through the rich grass towards the lowlands to the south. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim rise up on the northern horizon, and a thick wood looms off to the east. To the east the path leads up to the edge of the woodlands.

Exit.Description: The vale continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.
The vale continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The grass beneath you seems trampled by frequent use.

Room.Description: Lush green grass tumbles down the slopes of the vale edge. Weeping willows hang their heads and sway gently in the breeze. ExtraDescription.Description: Lush, green grass covers the ground beneath you.
The grassy ground slopes up towards a treeline in this direction.

Room.Description: Lush green grass tumbles down the slopes of the vale edge. Weeping willows hang their heads and sway gently in the breeze. Tiny natural springs bubble up from the ground, babbling softly as they run down through the rich grass towards the lowlands to the south. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim rise up on the northern horizon, and a thick wood looms off to the east.

Exit.Description: The vale continues in this direction.
The vale continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Lush, green grass covers the ground beneath you.
The grassy ground slopes up towards a treeline in this direction.

Room.Name: A Grassy Path Through a Deep Vale
Room.Description: This small path of trampled grass winds on through the gusty vale. Lush green grass tumbles down the slopes of the vale edge. Weeping willows hang their heads and sway gently in the breeze. Tiny natural springs bubble up from the ground, babbling softly as they run down through the rich grass towards the lowlands to the south. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim rise up on the northern horizon, and a thick wood looms off to the east.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.

Weeping willows hang their heads and sway gently in the breeze. Tiny natural springs bubble up from the ground, babbling softly as they run down through the rich grass towards the lowlands to the south. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim rise up on the northern horizon, and a thick wood looms off to the east. To the north the path leads uphill towards a rough path.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.
The vale continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The grass beneath you seems trampled by frequent use.
The grassy ground slopes up towards a treeline in this direction.

Room.Name: A Rough Path Sloping Towards a Vale
Room.Description: Small bushes and tall grass line the edges of this rough path. Large rocks jut out from beneath the rich brown dirt. Off to the south the land drops down into a rich green vale. Massive cypress and willow trees rise up just a ways off the trail, swaying gently in the breeze. The path leads off north towards a meadow, and winds south towards a large vale.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Jagged rocks dominate the dirt path beneath you.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.

Room.Name: A Rough Path Sloping Towards a Vale
Room.Description: Small bushes and tall grass line the edges of this rough path. Large rocks jut out from beneath the rich brown dirt. Off to the south the land drops down into a rich green vale. Massive cypress and willow trees rise up just a ways off the trail, swaying gently in the breeze. The path leads off north towards a meadow, and winds south towards a large vale.

The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Jagged rocks dominate the dirt path beneath you.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.

Room.Name: On the Fringe of a Quiet Meadow
Room.Description: This narrow dirt path leads up to the edge of a large meadow. Wildflowers and other scrubby brush grows along the edge of the trail. Birch and Ash trees form primal groves along the edges of the path. Off to the north the sound of chirping birds and the noise of wind through the grass grows louder. South of here the path leads down towards the cusp of a deep vale.

Exit.Description: A grassy meadow begins up ahead.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Jagged rocks dominate the dirt path beneath you.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.
Small bushes and tall grass line the edge of the path here.

Room.Name: Upon a Windswept Meadow
Room.Description: Thousands of wildflowers of every color, nod their heads in the breeze. Long tufts of green grass stand stifly above the flowers. An occasional tree trunk, bleached by the sun, lies on the ground half covered with vegitation. The musical sweetness of birds, and the wind dancing through the meadow, fills the air. Off to the north the twin peaks of Mount Cim reach towards the heavens. To the south a thick treeline looms on the horizon.

Exit.Description: The meadow continues in this direction.
The meadow continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Tall grasses and wildflowers blanket the ground beneath you.
Scrubby brush and small trees line the edge of the meadow.

Room.Name: On the Fringe of a Quiet Meadow
Room.Description: This narrow dirt path leads up to the edge of a large meadow. Wildflowers and other scrubby brush grows thicker farther down to the south. Birch and Ash trees form primal groves along the edge of the trail. To the north the bare expanse of the highlands leads up towards the mountains. The sound of chirping birds, and the sound of wind through the grass grows louder off to the west.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
A quiet meadow expands in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Large, jagged rocks dominate the trail here.
A quiet meadow expands in this direction.
Scrubby brush and wildflowers grow along the edge of the trail here.

Room.Name: A Steep Trail Winding Down Towards a Meadow
Room.Description: This narrow dirt path leads down through the highlands towards a large meadow. Wildflowers and other scrubby brush grows thicker farther down to the south. Birch and Ash trees form primal groves along the edge of the trail. To the north the bare expanse of the highlands leads up towards the Off to the south the woodlands loom darkly.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Large, jagged rocks dominate the trail here.
A large meadow can be seen in this direction.
The twin peaks loom up over the edge of the trail.

Room.Name: A Rocky Trail Through the Highlands
Room.Description: An army of jagged rocks occupies the nearly invisible trail. Gray-blue lichens cover the worn places of the lifeless stones. The twin peaks of Mount Cim stand majestically on the northern horizon. Occasional spruce and ash trees sprout up defiantly through the rocky soil. Far off to the south you can see the rolling green hills of the downs, where the breeze drops in to linger and dance in the grass. The Sywilm can be seen weaving between the dark woods and the downs like a shimmering thread of silver.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Large, jagged rocks make up this difficult trail.
The twin peaks loom up in this direction.
The foothills lead downward in this direction.

Room.Name: On the Stoney Banks of the Sywilm
Room.Description: Here, the crystal waters of the Sywilm pass patiently through the enduring rocks of the highlands. Gray-blue lichens cover the worn places of the lifeless stones. The twin peaks of Mount Cim stand majestically on the northern horizon. Occasional spruce and ash trees can be seen sprouting up defiantly along the river banks.

Exit.Description: A cluster of stones leads across the river in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Large, jagged rocks make up this difficult trail.
The highlands continue on in this direction.
The twin peaks loom up in this direction.

Room.Name: Atop the Falls of the Sywilm
Room.Description: The crystal clear waters of the Sywilm slide silently between the large stones beneath you. Small fish can be seen hovering beneath the surface of the water, above the stoney bed of the river. As the water reaches the edge cliff it breaks free of the clutches of the ground, and soars through the air before plunging into the ground below. A fine watery mist floats up over the edge of the falls, refracting the light and creating a beautiful spectrum. To the north the waters of the Sywilm flow out from beneath a sheer rock face.

Exit.Description: A cluster of stones leads across the river in this direction.
A cluster of stones leads across the river in this direction.
The rushing waters of the Sywilm careen off the edge of the cliff here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The waters of the Sywilm emerge in this direction, from beneath a rock face.
The waters of the Sywilm can be seen snaking of to the south.

Room.Name: On the Stoney Banks of the Sywilm
Room.Description: Here, the crystal waters of the Sywilm pass patiently through the enduring rocks of the highlands. Gray-blue lichens cover the worn places of the lifeless stones. The twin peaks of Mount Cim stand majestically on the northern horizon. Occasional spruce and ash sprout up defiantly along the banks of the river.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.

The highlands continue on in this direction.
The foothills leaD downward in this direction.

Room.Name: A Narrow Trail Through the Foothills
Room.Description: This narrow dirt path leads up through the foothills towards the mountains. Tall evergreens are positioned sparsely through the hills. Gray-blonde grasses which have made their way through the harsh rocky ground, blow gently in the wind. A wide variety of lichens cling to the abundant stones which had been thrown down from the mountain tops long ago. The landscape slopes upward to the north, towards the twin peaks. A small trail leads up to the edge of a cliff to the south, and to the west the stoney expanse of the highlands begins.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path leads up to a cliff.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks makes up the ground beneath you.
The twin peaks loom in this direction.

Room.Name: A Rock Shelf Overlooking the Downs
Room.Description: The entirety of the Downs is visible from here. The misty emerald hills roll like waves on the ocean far off in the distance. The wind rushes through the craggy rocks whistling now and then. Off to the southwest the Sywilm snakes down towards the lowland marshes far to the south. A thick wood looms off to the west of the river. The cliff itself drops off sharply and drops hundreds of feet down to the foothills below.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks makes up the ground beneath you.
A spectacular view of the woodlands unfolds in this direction.
A spectacular view of the downs unfolds in this direction.
A spectacular view of the downs unfolds in this direction.

A wide variety of lichens cling to the abundant stones which had been thrown down from the mountain tops long ago. The landcape slopes upward to the north, towards the twin peaks.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

The foothills continue on in this direction.

The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks makes up the ground beneath you.
The foothills continue downhill in this direction.
The foothills continue downhill in this direction.

Room.Name: On the Threshold of the Foothills of Mount Cim
Room.Description: Occasional evergreens stand lonely at the foot of the looming mountains. Gray-blonde grasses which have made their way through the harsh rocky ground, blow gently in the wind. A wide variety of lichens cling to the abundant stones which had been thrown from the mountain tops long ago. The green rolling fields of the downs end here and expand eastward. The lanscape slopes upward to the north, in the direction of the twin peaks.

Exit.Description: The path continues in this direction.
The path continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: A combination of brown dirt and small rocks makes up the ground beneath you.
The twin peaks of Mount Cim loom in the distance.
Lush green hills rise up in this direction.

Room.Name: High Above the Rushing River
Room.Description: The soft wind whistles through the air around you. The sound of the rushing waters of the Sywilm echo below. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim pierce the sky to the north. Off to the south the fieldstone bridge plunges into either side of the ravine.

Exit.Description: A fieldstone brigde looms up ahead.
The rushing, frothing, waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.

ExtraDescription.Description: Lush, rolling fields begin in this direction.
The twin peaks of Mount Cim rise up in the distance.
A dense wood looms in the distance.

Room.Name: Upon the Waters of the Sywilm
Room.Description: The white, frothing waters of the this river race down from the mountains to the north. The water crashes into the jagged rocks strewn throughout the river, producing a crystalline noise. Foam from the rough waters laps up against the stoney edges of the river banks. Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn over time. A massive bridge of fieldstone towers above you, granting passage across the swift waters.

Exit.Description: The river continues in this direction.
The river continues in this direction.
A massive bridge made of fieldstone towers above you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: A Bend in the Sywilm
Room.Description: Towering walls of grass rise up on either side of the angry waters. White frothing waters race down from the mountains to the north. All about you waters crash into jagged rocks, making a crystalline sound. Foam from the rough waters lap up against the stoney river banks. Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn by time. The cold and clear waters continue swiftly southward on their journey to the lowlands.

Exit.Description: The river continues in this direction.
The river continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn by time. The cold and clear waters continue swiftly southward on their journey to the lowlands.

The river continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: Upon the Waters of the Sywilm
Room.Description: Towering walls of grass rise up on either side of the angry waters. White frothing waters race down from the mountains to the north. All about you waters crash into jagged rocks, making a crystalline sound. Foam from the rough waters lap up against the stoney river banks. Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn by time. The cold and clear waters continue swiftly southward on their journey to the lowlands.

Exit.Description: The river continues in this direction.
The river continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: At the Base of a Magnificent Waterfall
Room.Description: A torrent of waters comes pouring down from the cliff high above you. The water careens into the rocks at the base of the falls with a deafening roar. A fine veil of mist floats through the air refracting the light into a beautiful spectrum during the daylight. Hearty green moss clings to the damp faces of the rocky cliff. High above, large eyries can be seen sitting upon various rock shelves. The swirling waters beneath the falls begin to more quickly as they flow silently to the south.

Exit.Description: A shear wall of falling water crashes into the rocks in this direction.
The river continues in this direction.
The mighty waters of the Sywilm poor down from above.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: High Above the Rushing River
Room.Description: The soft wind whistles through the air around you. The sound of the rushing waters of the Sywilm echo below. The majestic peaks of Mount Cim rise above the stone bridfe and pierce the sky to the north. Off to the south the Sywilm snakes its way down to the lowland marshes.

Exit.Description: A fieldstone brigde looms up ahead.
The rushing, frothing, waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.

ExtraDescription.Description: A dense wood looms in the distance.
The rushing waters of the Sywilm snake off in this direction.
Lush, rolling fields begin in this direction.

Room.Name: Upon the Waters of the Sywilm
Room.Description: The white, frothing waters of the this river race down from the mountains to the north. The water crashes into the jagged rocks strewn throughout the river, producing a crystalline noise. Foam from the rough waters laps up against the stoney edges of the river banks. Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn over time. A massive bridge of fieldstone towers above you, granting passage across the swift waters.

Exit.Description: The river continues in this direction.
The river continues in this direction.
A massive bridge made of fieldstone towers above you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn by time. The cold and clear waters continue swiftly southward on their journey to the lowlands.

The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: Upon the Waters of the Sywilm
Room.Description: Towering walls of grass rise up on either side of the angry waters. White frothing waters race down from the mountains to the north. All about you waters crash into jagged rocks, making a crystalline sound. Foam from the rough waters lap up against the stoney river banks. Swirling eddies spin silently behind large grey stones, which have been worn by time. The cold and clear waters continue swiftly southward on their journey to the lowlands.

Exit.Description: The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.
The river continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The churning waters of the Sywilm flow beneath you.
The stoney banks of the river end at the grassy turf, which runs up the side of the ravine.

Room.Name: A Widening in the Sywilm
Room.Description: The current slows down significantly here, as the land begins to become more level. The width of the river expands, and flows patiently around the rocks and trees on its journey towards the marshes. The river has overun the banks here and floods out into the surrounding woodlands. Off to the west the river flows lazily into a rather large waterway. Far to the north the silhouette of the mountains stand gray-blue against the sky.

Exit.Description: The waters of the Sywilm flow in from this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: The waters of the Sywilm flow lazily beneath you.
The waters flow freely through the woodlands in this direction.
The waters flow freely through the woodlands in this direction.

Room.Name: A Damp Cavern Behind the Falls
Room.Description: The walls of this small cavern are composed of gray slate that glistens dimly. A garbled view of the outside world can be seen through the fall sheet of water to the south. The floor shimmers as the light from the outside is twisted and contorted as it passes through the falls. The ceiling drips constantly upon the smooth wet floor over the cavern, which appears to have been hewn long ago.

Exit.Description: A translucent sheet of waters pours down in front of the cavern here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Small puddles of water collect upon the cold stone floor of the cavern.
Water drips from this dull gray ceiling.
The cold, damp walls of the cave lie in this direction.
The cold, damp walls of the cave lie in this direction.
The cold, damp walls of the cave lie in this direction.

Room.Name: Mid-air Near the Falls
Room.Description: Hundreds of gallons of crystal clear water tumble through the air. Tiny droplets of water break off and disipate into a mist which floats on the wind. Down below the waters crash dramatically into the jagged rocks below, making a tremedous noise. A ways above the water can be seen pouring off the edge of the cliff and flying freely back towards the earth.

Exit.Description: The waters of the Sywilm can be seen pouring off the edge of the cliff.
The waters of the Sywilm crash into the rocks below.

ExtraDescription.Description: A sheer rock face lies on the side of the falls here.
The waters of the Sywilm can be seen snaking of to the south.
A sheer rock face lies on the side of the falls here.
A huge mass of water falls towards the ground in this direction.

NPC.name: ball will wisp orb light
NPC.description: A small orb gives off a beautiful spectrum of light as it hovers silently above the ground. The orb twinkles and shimmers as it moves slowly with the breeze.
NPC.longDescription: A glowing ball of light floats silently through the night air.

NPC.name: rabbit small cotton tail
NPC.description: A small gray rabbit with long ears and a bushy white tail is before you.
NPC.longDescription: A small cotton-tail rabbit hops along here.

NPC.name: grizzled mountain goat
NPC.description: A gray mountain goat with short pointy horns stands before you. Long matted hair hangs down over its cloved hooves.
NPC.longDescription: A grizzled mountain goat moves nimbly amongst the rocks.

NPC.name: snake small brownish-green
NPC.description: A small snake with brown and green markings slithers slowly across the ground.
NPC.longDescription: A small brownish-green snake slithers slowly through the mud.

NPC.name: fox red small
NPC.description: A small red fox with thick matted fur, and pointy ears is before you. His grey eyes watch his surroundings keenly. His black nose flares, taking in the smells around him..
NPC.longDescription: A small fox stalks stealthily through the grass.

NPC.name: red tailed hawk
NPC.description: This hawk has brown plumage with a bright red tail. Hit beak is yellow and hooked, and his eyes watch his surroundings closely.
NPC.longDescription: A red-tailed hawk soars silently upon the wind.

NPC.name: wolf stone gray
NPC.description: A large wolf with a healthy coat of stone-gray fur stands here. His ears perk up at the slightest sounds, and you notice long fangs protruding from the sides of his mouth.
NPC.longDescription: A stone-gray wolf quietly prowls the area.

NPC.name: trout large
NPC.description: A large grey trout with a green hue swims through the water here.
NPC.longDescription: A large trout jumps up out of the water and comes back down with a splash.

NPC.name: thief cloaked drab man slender ragged
NPC.description: A gaunt human, ragged and weathered stands before you. His drab clothing hangs losely from his firm body. A small blade glistens from beneath his belt.
NPC.longDescription: A ragged, slender man wearing drab clothing sneaks through the area.

NPC.name: ranger human man
NPC.description: A tall rugged man wearing a deep green tunic is before you. His visage is stern and weathered by the elements. A long wooden staff is strapped to his back, and his leather boots are caked with mud.
NPC.longDescription: A tall, rugged looking man crouches, surveying the ground here.

Item.Name: spring clear water
Item.LongDescription: A small pool of water bubbles up from between several rocks.

Item.Name: drab wool woolen cloak pile
Item.LongDescription: A drab pile of wool lies in a heap on the ground.

Item.Name: bracer leather worn
Item.LongDescription: A worn piece of leather lies on the ground here.

Item.Name: staff crystal
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful crystaline staff lies here amongst the treasure.
